_sText:
Screenshot is just one (more screenshots arent needed). Its with HUD, because my console is blocked.

- **Authorization:** free to use, but in the map and on pages where is the map indicated, must be my name as the author of the prefab "This football/soccer system was created by Sodan Tok" "Football/soccer was created by Sodan Tok"
- **Contributors:** number and the sign font (!Black), red and blue textures (icecream); ball (soccermode)
- **Description:** Prefab of small playground with two gates and a fully functional football(soccer) system, every goal is counted in scoreboard (up to 5 goals). After each goal the ball is teleported to the center and countdown is turned on. After 5 goals the game ends and the ball is blocked. Button under the Sodan Tok sign is used to reset scoreboard.
- **Contact:** sodantok (steamname); www.battleforce.cz

- **Map EXAMPLES:**
 http://www.gamebanana.com/maps/150571 (jail); http://www.gamebanana.com/maps/144139 (minigame)
